I

io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount - package io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount
 
io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.parser - package io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.parser
 

L

Launcher - Class in io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount
Entry point class.
Launcher() - Constructor for class io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.Launcher
 
loadFile() - Method in class io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.parser.Parser
Streams the file and stores into the map the count of words present in the file.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.Launcher
Entry point method that allows users to specify a list of files to be processed.

P

Parser - Class in io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.parser
Parser class will handle streaming the file and loading words and their respective count into the TreeMap.
Parser(String) - Constructor for class io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.parser.Parser
This constructor will instantiate the necessary classes to parse the file and validate input.

W

writeResult() - Method in class io.saul.martin.interview.wordcount.parser.Parser
Navigates through the map keySet and generates a CSV file with the word count for the specified file.
